title: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook spaghetti in boiling salted water according to package instructions until al dente.
In a separate bowl, whisk together eggs, grated Parmesan cheese, and black pepper.
In a skillet, cook diced pancetta until crispy. Remove from heat and drain excess fat.
Once spaghetti is cooked, drain and reserve some pasta water.
Add hot spaghetti to the skillet with pancetta. Toss to combine.
Pour egg and cheese mixture over the hot spaghetti. Quickly toss to coat the pasta, using reserved pasta water to loosen the sauce if needed.
Serve immediately with additional grated Parmesan cheese and black pepper.

title: Chicken Alfredo
description: Creamy pasta dish with tender chicken, garlic, and Parmesan cheese.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook fettuccine in boiling salted water according to package instructions until al dente.
Season chicken breasts with salt and black pepper. In a skillet, cook chicken until golden brown and cooked through. Remove from skillet and slice into strips.
In the same skillet, add minced garlic and cook until fragrant.
Add heavy cream to the skillet and bring to a simmer.
Stir in grated Parmesan cheese until melted and smooth.
Return cooked chicken strips to the skillet and toss to coat in the sauce.
Add cooked fettuccine to the skillet and toss to coat in the sauce.
Serve hot, garnished with fresh parsley.

title: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic Italian pizza topped with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, basil, and olive oil.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Preheat oven to 475°F (245°C) and place a pizza stone in the oven to heat.
Stretch out pizza dough on a lightly floured surface to desired thickness.
Spread tomato sauce evenly over the pizza dough, leaving a border for the crust.
Arrange sliced mozzarella cheese over the sauce.
Top with fresh basil leaves.
Drizzle olive oil over the pizza and season with salt and black pepper.
Carefully transfer the pizza onto the preheated pizza stone in the oven.
Bake for 10-12 minutes or until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
Remove from oven, slice, and serve hot.
